00005 #include <fstream>

00010 using namespace std;
00011 using namespace xercesc;
00012 //=========================================================================================
00013 // generateOdePred - generate the source code for OdePred or IdentPred classes
00014 //
00015 // The followings have special meanings to the ODE models (ADVAN6, 8, 9):
00016 //
00017 // <from data set>
00018 //
00019 //    DV
00020 //    MDV
00021 //    EVID
00022 //    CMT
00023 //    PCMT
00024 //    AMT
00025 //    RATE
00026 //    TIME
00027 //
00028 // <user's responsiblity to compute>
00029 //
00030 //    Y
00031 //    DADT(1) .. .DADT(n)
00032 //
00033 // <user's option to compute>
00034 //
00035 //    R1 ... Rn  // n is #of compartments + the output compartment
00036 //    D1 ... Dn
00037 //    ALAG1 ... ALAGn
00038 //    S1 ... Sn
00039 //    F1 ... Fm  // m = n-1
00040 //    P(1) ... P(x)
00041 //    A(1) ... A(n)
00042 //    T
00043 //    TSCALE
00044 //    F
00045 //    FO  (ef-oh)
00046 //    F0  (ef-zero)
00047 //    S0  (es-zero)
00048 
00049 //
00050 //=========================================================================================
00051 void NonmemTranslator::generateOdePred( const char* fPkEqn_cpp,

00053                     const char* fErrorEqn_cpp,

00063   // "labels" is an array of data labels.  The order in which the labels are stored
00064   // must not be disturbed.
00065   //
00066   const vector<string> * const labels = table->getLabels();
00067   const int nLabels = labels->size();

00071   // A SymbolTable object uses a std::map object as the actual

00073   // table is though member functions provided by SymbolTable class.
00074   // Another way, which is used here, is to access the internal

00299   //
00300   // Declare variables.
00301   //
00302   // REVISIT Sachiko 08/05/2005
00303   // Make Symbol objects carry the data type: int/string/float.
00304   //
00305   for( pT = t->begin(); pT != t->end(); pT++ )
00306     {
00307       const string varName            = pT->second.name;
00308       enum Symbol::Ownership  owner   = pT->second.owner;
00309       enum Symbol::ObjectType objType = pT->second.object_type;
00310       enum Symbol::Access     access  = pT->second.access;
00311       
00312       if( owner == Symbol::DATASET )
00313         {
00314       if( varName == nonmem::ID )
00315         {
00316           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   std::string " << varName << ";" << endl;
00317           if( pT->second.synonym != "" )
00318         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   std::string " << pT->second.synonym << ";" << endl;
00319         }
00320       else if( varName == nonmem::EVID || varName == nonmem::CMT || varName == nonmem::PCMT )
00321         {
00322           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   int " << varName << ";" << endl;
00323           if( pT->second.synonym != "" )
00324         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   int " << pT->second.synonym << ";" << endl;
00325         }
00326       else
00327         {
00328           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_ValueType " << varName << ";" << endl;
00329           if( pT->second.synonym != "" )
00330         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_ValueType " << pT->second.synonym << ";" << endl;
00331         }
00332         }
00333       else if( owner == Symbol::SYSTEM )
00334         {
00335       if( objType == Symbol::MATRIX )
00336         {
00337           continue;
00338         }
00339       else if( objType == Symbol::VECTOR )
00340         {
00341           if( varName == nonmem::DADT || varName == nonmem::P 
00342           || varName == nonmem::A
00343           || varName == nonmem::THETA || varName == nonmem::ETA || varName == nonmem::EPS )
00344         {
00345           if( access == Symbol::READWRITE ) // A
00346             oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::iterator " << varName << ";" << endl;
00347           else // DADT, P, THETA, ETA, EPS
00348             oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::const_iterator " << varName << ";" << endl;
00349         }
00350           else
00351         continue;
00352         }
00353       else // Scalars
00354         {
00355           if( access == Symbol::READONLY )
00356         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_ValueType " << varName << ";" << endl;
00357           else if( access == Symbol::READWRITE )
00358         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_ValueType & " << varName << ";" << endl;
00359           else
00360         continue;
00361         }
00362         }
00363       else // objType == Symbol::USER
00364         {
00365       if( objType == Symbol::MATRIX )
00366         {
00367           // can't be! error!
00368         }
00369       else if( objType == Symbol::VECTOR )
00370         {
00371           if( access == Symbol::READONLY )
00372         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::const_iterator " << varName << ";" << endl;
00373           else if( access == Symbol::READWRITE )
00374         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::iterator " << varName << ";" << endl;
00375           else
00376         continue;
00377         }
00378       else // Scalars
00379         {
00380           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_ValueType " << varName << ";" << endl;
00381         }
00382         }
00383     }
00384 
00385   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "};" << endl;
00386   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;

00460     {

00499   // -------------
00500   // getVariableInfo()
00501   // -------------
00502   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "template <class spk_ValueType>" << endl;
00503   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "void OdePred<spk_ValueType>::getVariableInfo( std::string& messageStr ) const" << endl;
00504   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
00505   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  using namespace std;" << endl;
00506   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00507   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  ostringstream message;" << endl;
00508   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00509   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  int k;" << endl;
00510   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00511 
00512   //
00513   // Put variables and their values into the message stream.
00514   //
00515   for( pT = t->begin(); pT != t->end(); pT++ )
00516   {
00517     const string varName            = pT->second.name;
00518     enum Symbol::ObjectType objType = pT->second.object_type;
00519     
00520     if( objType == Symbol::MATRIX )
00521     {
00522       continue;
00523     }
00524     else if( varName == nonmem::WRES ||
00525              varName == nonmem::ETARES ||
00526              varName == nonmem::WETARES ||
00527              varName == nonmem::CPRED ||
00528              varName == nonmem::CRES ||
00529              varName == nonmem::CWRES ||
00530              varName == nonmem::CETARES ||
00531              varName == nonmem::CWETARES ||
00532              varName == nonmem::IPRED ||
00533              varName == nonmem::IRES ||
00534              varName == nonmem::IWRES ||
00535              varName == nonmem::IETARES ||
00536              varName == nonmem::IWETARES ||
00537              varName == nonmem::PPRED ||
00538              varName == nonmem::PRES ||
00539              varName == nonmem::PWRES ||
00540              varName == nonmem::PETARES ||
00541              varName == nonmem::PWETARES )
00542     {
00543       continue;
00544     }
00545     else if( varName == nonmem::EPS &&
00546              ( getApproximation() == STD_TWO_STAGE || getApproximation() == GLOBAL_TWO_STAGE || getApproximation() == ITERATIVE_TWO_STAGE ) )
00547     {
00548       continue;
00549     }
00550     else if( varName == nonmem::DADT ||
00551              varName == nonmem::P ||
00552              varName == nonmem::A ||
00553              varName == nonmem::THETA ||
00554              varName == nonmem::ETA ||
00555              varName == nonmem::EPS )
00556     {
00557       if( varName == nonmem::A || varName == nonmem::DADT )
00558       {
00559         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  for ( k = 0; k < this->getNComp(); k++ )" << endl;
00560       }
00561       else if( varName == nonmem::P )
00562       {
00563         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  for ( k = 0; k < spk_p.size(); k++ )" << endl;
00564       }
00565       else if( varName == nonmem::THETA )
00566       {
00567         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  for ( k = 0; k < " << myThetaLen << "; k++ )" << endl;
00568       }
00569       else if( varName == nonmem::ETA )
00570       {
00571         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  for ( k = 0; k < " << myEtaLen << "; k++ )" << endl;
00572       }
00573       else if( varName == nonmem::EPS )
00574       {
00575         oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  for ( k = 0; k < " << myEpsLen << "; k++ )" << endl;
00576       }
00577       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  {" << endl;
00578       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "    message << \"" << varName << "[\" << k + 1 << \"] = \" << " << varName << "[k] << endl;" << endl;
00579       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  }" << endl;
00580     }
00581     else // Scalars
00582     {
00583       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  message << \"" << varName << " = \" << " << varName << " << endl;" << endl;
00584     }
00585   }
00586 
00587   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  // Set the string containing the variable information." << endl;
00588   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  messageStr = message.str();" << endl;
00589   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "}" << endl;
00590   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00591

00597   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
00598   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "  return spk_perm->getNObservs( spk_i );" << endl;

00600   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;

00612   // -------------
00613   // lininterp()
00614   // -------------
00615   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "// This uses TIME and DV values" << endl;
00616   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "template <class spk_ValueType>" << endl;
00617   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "const spk_ValueType " << className << "<spk_ValueType>::lininterp( const std::string& depVarName )" << endl;
00618   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
00619   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   const int nObservs  = getNObservs( spk_curWho );" << endl;
00620   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   const int nRecords  = getNRecords( spk_curWho );" << endl;
00621   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   std::vector<spk_ValueType> indVar( ( depVarName == \"" << nonmem::DV << "\"? nObservs:nRecords) );" << endl;
00622   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   std::vector<spk_ValueType> depVar( ( depVarName == \"" << nonmem::DV << "\"? nObservs:nRecords) );" << endl;
00623   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   std::vector<spk_ValueType> depVarRecords( nRecords );" << endl;
00624   pLabel = labels->begin();
00625   while( pLabel != labels->end() )
00626     {
00627       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   if( depVarName == \"" << *pLabel << "\" )" << endl;
00628       if( *pLabel == nonmem::ID )
00629     {
00630       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      throw SpkException( SpkError::SPK_USER_INPUT_ERR, " << endl;
00631           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                         \"ID cannot be interpolated!\", " << endl;
00632           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                           __LINE__, __FILE__ );" << endl;
00633     }
00634       else if( *pLabel == nonmem::MDV )
00635     {
00636       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      throw SpkException( SpkError::SPK_USER_INPUT_ERR, " << endl;
00637           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                         \"MDV cannot be interpolated!\", " << endl;
00638           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                           __LINE__, __FILE__ );" << endl;
00639     }
00640       else if( *pLabel == nonmem::EVID )
00641     {
00642       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      throw SpkException( SpkError::SPK_USER_INPUT_ERR, " << endl;
00643           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                         \"EVID cannot be interpolated!\", " << endl;
00644           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                           __LINE__, __FILE__ );" << endl;
00645     }
00646       else if( *pLabel == nonmem::CMT )
00647     {
00648       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      throw SpkException( SpkError::SPK_USER_INPUT_ERR, " << endl;
00649           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                         \"CMT cannot be interpolated!\", " << endl;
00650           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                           __LINE__, __FILE__ );" << endl;
00651     }
00652       else if( *pLabel == nonmem::PCMT )
00653     {
00654       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      throw SpkException( SpkError::SPK_USER_INPUT_ERR, " << endl;
00655           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                         \"PCMT cannot be interpolated!\", " << endl;
00656           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                           __LINE__, __FILE__ );" << endl;
00657     }
00658       else
00659     {
00660       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         depVarRecords = spk_perm->data[spk_curWho]->" << *pLabel << ";" << endl;
00661     }
00662       
00663       pLabel++;
00664     }
00665   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   if( depVarName == \"" << nonmem::DV << "\" )" << endl;
00666   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   {" << endl;
00667   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      for( int j=0, k=0; j<nRecords; j++ )" << endl;
00668   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      {" << endl;
00669   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         if( spk_perm->data[spk_curWho]->" << nonmem::MDV << "[j] == 0 )" << endl;
00670   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         {" << endl;
00671   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "            indVar[k] = spk_perm->data[spk_curWho]->" << nonmem::TIME << "[j];" << endl;
00672   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "            if( TIME < indVar[k] )" << endl;
00673   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "            {" << endl;
00674   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "               char m[ SpkError::maxMessageLen() ];" << endl;
00675   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "               snprintf( m, SpkError::maxMessageLen(), " << endl;
00676   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                        \"The evaluation point specified for linear interpolation is less than the %d-th data point time for the %d-th individual.\", spk_curWho );" << endl;
00677   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "            }" << endl;
00678   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "            depVar[k] = depVarRecords[j];" << endl;
00679   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "            k++;" << endl;
00680   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         }" << endl;
00681   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      }" << endl;
00682   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   }" << endl;
00683   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   else" << endl;
00684   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   {" << endl;
00685   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      indVar = spk_perm->data[spk_curWho]->" << nonmem::TIME << ";" << endl;
00686   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      depVar = depVarRecords;" << endl;
00687   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   }" << endl;
00688   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   return linearInterpolate( T, " << endl;
00689   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                             indVar," << endl;

00715         {

00718         }

00788     {

00790       char Di[64];

00792       char Si[64];
00793       char Fi[64];
00794       snprintf( Ri,    64, "R%d", i+1 );
00795       snprintf( Di,    64, "D%d", i+1 );
00796       snprintf( ALAGi, 64, "ALAG%d", i+1 );
00797       snprintf( Si,    64, "S%d", i+1 );
00798       snprintf( Fi,    64, "F%d", i+1 );
00799       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   " << Ri << "     = OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getCompInfusRate    (" << i << ");" << endl;
00800       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   " << Di << "     = OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getCompInfusDurat   (" << i << ");" << endl;
00801       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   " << ALAGi << "  = OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getCompAbsorpLagTime(" << i << ");" << endl;
00802       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   " << Si << "     = OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getCompScaleParam   (" << i << ");" << endl;
00803       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   " << Fi << "     = OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getCompBioavailFrac (" << i << ");" << endl;
00804     }
00805   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00806   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   // Get const iterators" << endl;
00807   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   A     = OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getCompAmountIterator();" << endl;
00808   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00809   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   // Get non-const iterators" << endl;
00810   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   DADT  =  OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getCompAmount_tIterator();" << endl;
00811   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00812   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   // Get a constant value" << endl;
00813   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   T     = OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getT();" << endl;
00814   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00815 
00816   //
00817   // THETA: This value is given by the system through the eval() interface.
00818   //
00819   //  oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::const_iterator " << nonmem::THETA;
00820   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   " << nonmem::THETA << " = spk_indepVar.begin() + spk_thetaOffset;" << endl;
00821   //
00822   // NONMEM makes aliases to each element of the vector.
00823   // THETA(1) can be referred to as THETA1, THETA(2) as THETA2 and so on.
00824   // 
00825   for( int i=0; i<myThetaLen; i++ )
00826     {
00827       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::const_iterator " << nonmem::THETA << i+1 << endl;
00828       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   = spk_indepVar.begin() + spk_thetaOffset + " << i << ";" << endl;
00829     }
00830 
00831   //
00832   // ETA: This value is given by the system through the eval() interface.
00833   // 
00834   //oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::const_iterator " << nonmem::ETA;
00835   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   " << nonmem::ETA << " = spk_indepVar.begin() + spk_etaOffset;" << endl;
00836   //
00837   // NONMEM makes aliases to each element of the vector.
00838   // ETA(1) can be referred to as ETA1, ETA(2) as ETA2 and so on.
00839   // 
00840   for( int i=0; i<myEtaLen; i++ )
00841     {
00842       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::const_iterator " << nonmem::ETA << i+1 << endl;
00843       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   = spk_indepVar.begin() + spk_etaOffset + " << i << ";" << endl;
00844     }
00845 
00846   if( getTarget() == POP )
00847     {
00848       //
00849       // EPS: This value is given by the system through the eval() interface.
00850       // 
00851       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   if ( spk_epsLen != 0 )" << endl;
00852       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   {" << endl;
00853       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      // Skip this if there are no eps values." << endl;
00854       //oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::const_iterator " << nonmem::EPS;
00855       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      " << nonmem::EPS << " = spk_indepVar.begin() + spk_epsOffset;" << endl;
00856       //
00857       // NONMEM makes aliases to each element of the vector.
00858       // EPS(1) can be referred to as EPS1, EPS(2) as EPS2 and so on.
00859       // 
00860       for( int i=0; i<myEpsLen; i++ )
00861     {
00862       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::const_iterator " << nonmem::EPS << i+1 << endl;
00863       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << " = spk_indepVar.begin() + spk_epsOffset + " << i << ";" << endl; 
00864     }
00865       oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   }" << endl;
00866     }
00867   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00868   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "}" << endl;
00869   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00870 
00871   // ------------
00872   // saveUsrEnv()
00873   // ------------
00874   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "template <class spk_ValueType>" << endl;
00875   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "void " << className << "<spk_ValueType>::saveUserEnv( int spk_thetaOffset, int spk_thetaLen," << endl;
00876   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                              int spk_etaOffset,   int spk_etaLen,"               << endl;
00877   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                              int spk_epsOffset,   int spk_epsLen,"               << endl;
00878   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                              int spk_fOffset,     int spk_fLen,"                 << endl;
00879   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                              int spk_yOffset,     int spk_yLen,"                 << endl;
00880   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                              int spk_i,"                                         << endl;
00881   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                              int spk_j,"                                         << endl;
00882   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                              const std::vector<spk_ValueType>& spk_indepVar,"    << endl;
00883   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                              const std::vector<spk_ValueType>& spk_depVar )"     << endl;
00884   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
00885 
00886   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   assert( spk_curWho == spk_i );" << endl;
00887   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   assert( spk_curWhichRecord == spk_j );" << endl;
00888 
00889   // Store the current values in temporary storage and also copy into the supper classes.
00890   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   " << nonmem::PRED << " = " << nonmem::F << ";" << endl;
00891   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   " << nonmem::RES  << " = (" << nonmem::MDV << "==0?" << nonmem::DV << "-" << nonmem::PRED << " : 0 );" << endl;
00892 
00893   // Keep computed values in a temporary location.
00894   for( pT = t->begin(); pT != t->end(); pT++ )
00895     {
00896       // THETA, ETA, EPS are given OdePred::eval() or IdentPred::eval() as vectors by the caller.
00897       // So, we have to treat these guys a bit different from the user variables
00898       // which are scalar values.
00899       const string label                 = pT->second.name;
00900       enum Symbol::Ownership owner       = pT->second.owner;
00901       enum Symbol::ObjectType objectType = pT->second.object_type;
00902       enum Symbol::Access access         = pT->second.access;
00903 
00904       // Data items are constant, so we don't need to keep them.
00905       if( owner == Symbol::DATASET )
00906     continue;
00907 
00908       else if( owner == Symbol::SYSTEM )
00909         {
00910           if( objectType == Symbol::VECTOR )
00911             {
00912               if( label == nonmem::THETA )
00913             {
00914               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   copy( " << label << ", " << label << "+spk_thetaLen, ";
00915               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_temp.data[ spk_i ]->" << label << "[ spk_j ].begin() ); " << endl;
00916                 }
00917               else if( label == nonmem::ETA )
00918             {
00919               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   copy( " << label << ", " << label << "+spk_etaLen, ";
00920               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_temp.data[ spk_i ]->" << label << "[ spk_j ].begin() ); " << endl;
00921             }
00922               else if( label == nonmem::EPS )
00923             {
00924               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   if ( spk_epsLen != 0 )" << endl;
00925               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   {" << endl;
00926               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      // Skip this if there are no eps values." << endl;
00927               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "      copy( " << label << ", " << label << "+spk_epsLen, ";
00928               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_temp.data[ spk_i ]->" << label << "[ spk_j ].begin() ); " << endl;
00929               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   }" << endl;
00930             }
00931               else if( label == nonmem::P )
00932             {
00933               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   copy( " << label << ", " << label << "+spk_nParameters, ";
00934               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_temp.data[ spk_i ]->" << label << "[ spk_j ].begin() ); " << endl;
00935             }
00936               else if( label == nonmem::A || label == nonmem::DADT )
00937             {
00938               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   copy( " << label << ", " << label << "+spk_nCompartments, ";
00939               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_temp.data[ spk_i ]->" << label << "[ spk_j ].begin() ); " << endl;
00940             }
00941           else
00942         {}
00943         }
00944           else if( objectType == Symbol::MATRIX )
00945             {
00946               continue;
00947         }
00948           else // Scalar
00949         {
00950           if( label == nonmem::PRED || label == nonmem::RES || access == Symbol::READWRITE )
00951         {
00952           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_temp.data[ spk_i ]->" << label << "[ spk_j ]";
00953           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << " = " << label << ";" << endl;
00954         }
00955         }
00956     }
00957       else // User
00958     {
00959       if( objectType == Symbol::SCALAR && access == Symbol::READWRITE )
00960         {  
00961           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   spk_temp.data[ spk_i ]->" << label << "[ spk_j ]";
00962           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << " = " << label << ";" << endl;
00963         }
00964     }
00965     }   
00966   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
00967 
00968   // Saving/moving computed values to ensure a complete set of values
00969   // is available even when a failure occurs.
00970   //
00971   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   if( spk_i == " << getPopSize() << "-1 && spk_j == spk_perm->data[spk_i]->";
00972   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << nonmem::ID << ".size()-1 )" << endl;
00973   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   {" << endl;
00974   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "     // This means, SPK advanced in iteration." << endl;
00975   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "     // Move spk_temporary storage to spk_permanent storage." << endl;
00976   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "     spk_isIterCompleted = true;" << endl;
00977   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "     for( int i=0; i < spk_nIndividuals; i++ )" << endl;
00978   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "     {" << endl;
00979   // User defined variables spk_temp(current) => spk_permanent
00980   // The user defined scalar variables
00981   for( pT = t->begin(); pT != t->end(); pT++ )
00982     {
00983       const string label                 = pT->second.name;
00984       enum Symbol::Ownership  owner      = pT->second.owner;
00985       enum Symbol::ObjectType objectType = pT->second.object_type;
00986       enum Symbol::Access access         = pT->second.access;
00987 
00988       if( owner == Symbol::DATASET )
00989         continue;
00990       else if( owner == Symbol::SYSTEM )
00991         {
00992       if( objectType == Symbol::MATRIX )
00993         continue;
00994       else if( objectType == Symbol::VECTOR )
00995         {
00996           if( label == nonmem::THETA 
00997           || label == nonmem::ETA 
00998           || label == nonmem::DADT 
00999           || label == nonmem::P 
01000           || label == nonmem::A )
01001         {
01002           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         spk_perm->data[ i ]->" << label;
01003           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << " = spk_temp.data[ i ]->";
01004           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << label << ";" << endl;
01005         }
01006           else if( label == nonmem::EPS )
01007         {
01008               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         if ( spk_epsLen != 0 )" << endl;
01009               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         {" << endl;
01010               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "            // Skip this if there are no eps values." << endl;
01011           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "            spk_perm->data[ i ]->" << label;
01012           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << " = spk_temp.data[ i ]->";
01013           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << label << ";" << endl;
01014               oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         }" << endl;
01015         }
01016         }
01017           else if( objectType == Symbol::MATRIX )
01018             {
01019               continue;
01020         }
01021           else // Scalar
01022         {
01023           if( label == nonmem::PRED || label == nonmem::RES || access == Symbol::READWRITE )
01024         {
01025           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         spk_perm->data[ i ]->" << label;
01026           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << " = spk_temp.data[ i ]->" << label << ";" << endl;
01027         }
01028         }
01029         }
01030       else // User
01031         { 
01032       if( objectType == Symbol::SCALAR && access == Symbol::READWRITE )
01033         {
01034           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "         spk_perm->data[ i ]->" << label;
01035           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << " = spk_temp.data[ i ]->";
01036           oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << label << ";" << endl;
01037         }
01038     }
01039     }      
01040   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "     }" << endl;
01041   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   }" << endl;
01042   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   else" << endl;
01043   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   {" << endl;
01044   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "     spk_isIterCompleted = false;" << endl;
01045   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   }" << endl;
01046   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
01047   //
01049   
01050   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "}" << endl;
01051 
01052   // --------
01053   // evalPk()
01054   // --------
01055   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "template <class spk_ValueType>" << endl;
01056   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "void " << endl;
01057   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "" << className << "<spk_ValueType>::evalPk( int spk_thetaOffset, int spk_thetaLen,"           << endl;
01058   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                int spk_etaOffset,   int spk_etaLen,"             << endl;
01059   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                int spk_i,"                                       << endl;
01060   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                int spk_j,"                                       << endl;
01061   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                const std::vector<spk_ValueType>& spk_indepVar )" << endl;
01062   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
01063   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   evalPk(  OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getT() );" << endl;
01064   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "}" << endl;
01065 
01066   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "template <class spk_ValueType>" << endl;
01067   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "void " << endl;
01068   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "" << className << "<spk_ValueType>::evalPk( const spk_ValueType & t )" << endl;
01069   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
01070   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   T = t;" << endl;
01071   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
01072   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //=========================================" << endl;
01073   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   // Begin User Code for $PK                 " << endl;
01074   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //-----------------------------------------" << endl;
01075   ifstream iPkEqn( fPkEqn_cpp );
01076   if( !iPkEqn.good() )
01077     {
01078       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01079       snprintf( mess, SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01080         "Failed to open %s file.", fPkEqn_cpp );
01081       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_STD_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01082       throw e;
01083     }
01084   while( iPkEqn.get(ch) )
01085     oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h.put(ch);
01086   iPkEqn.close();
01087   remove( fPkEqn_cpp );
01088   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //-----------------------------------------" << endl;
01089   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   // End User Code for $PK                   " << endl;
01090   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //=========================================" << endl;
01091       
01092   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "}" << endl;
01093   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
01094   
01095   // ---------
01096   // evalDes()
01097   // ---------
01098   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "template <class spk_ValueType>" << endl;
01099   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "void " << endl;
01100   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "" << className << "<spk_ValueType>::evalDes  ( int spk_thetaOffset, int spk_thetaLen,"           << endl;
01101   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                   int spk_i, int spk_j,"                            << endl;
01102   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                   const std::vector<spk_ValueType>& spk_indepVar )" << endl;
01103   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
01104   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   evalDes(  OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getT(),  OdePredBase<spk_ValueType>::getCompAmountIterator() );" << endl;
01105   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "}" << endl;
01106   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
01107 
01108   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "template <class spk_ValueType>" << endl;
01109   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "void " << endl;
01110   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "" << className << "<spk_ValueType>::evalDes( const spk_ValueType & t," << endl;
01111   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                typename std::vector<spk_ValueType>::const_iterator a )" << endl;
01112   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
01113   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   T = t;" << endl;
01114   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   A = a;" << endl;
01115   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
01116   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //=========================================" << endl;
01117   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   // Begin User Code for $DES                " << endl;
01118   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //-----------------------------------------" << endl;
01119   ifstream iDiffEqn( fDiffEqn_cpp );
01120   if( !iDiffEqn.good() )
01121     {
01122       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01123       snprintf( mess, 
01124         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01125         "Failed to open %s file.", fDiffEqn_cpp );
01126       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_STD_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01127       throw e;
01128     }
01129   while( iDiffEqn.get(ch) )
01130     oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h.put(ch);
01131   iDiffEqn.close();
01132   remove( fDiffEqn_cpp );
01133   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //-----------------------------------------" << endl;
01134   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   // End User Code for $DES                  " << endl;
01135   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //=========================================" << endl;
01136       
01137   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
01138   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "}" << endl;
01139   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
01140 
01141   // -----------
01142   // evalError()
01143   // -----------
01144   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "template <class spk_ValueType>" << endl;
01145   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "void " << endl;
01146   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "" << className << "<spk_ValueType>::evalError( int spk_thetaOffset, int spk_thetaLen,"           << endl;
01147   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                   int spk_etaOffset,   int spk_etaLen,"             << endl;
01148   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                   int spk_epsOffset,   int spk_epsLen,"             << endl;
01149   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                   int spk_i,"                                       << endl;
01150   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                   int spk_j,"                                       << endl;
01151   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "                                   const std::vector<spk_ValueType>& spk_indepVar )" << endl;
01152   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
01153   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   assert( spk_curWho == spk_i );" << endl;
01154   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   assert( spk_curWhichRecord == spk_j );" << endl;
01155   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   assert( spk_thetaLen == " << myThetaLen << " );" << endl;
01156   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   assert( ( spk_etaLen == " << myEtaLen << " && spk_epsLen == " << myEpsLen   << " ) ||" << endl;
01157   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "           ( spk_etaLen == " << myEpsLen << " && spk_epsLen == " << 0          << " ) );   // Allow these for two-stage methods." << endl;
01158   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;      
01159   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   return evalError();" << endl;
01160   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "}" << endl;
01161   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << endl;
01162   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "template <class spk_ValueType>" << endl;
01163   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "void" << endl;
01164   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "" << className << "<spk_ValueType>::evalError()" << endl;
01165   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "{" << endl;
01166 
01167   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //=========================================" << endl;
01168   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   // Begin User Code for $ERROR              " << endl;
01169   oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h << "   //-----------------------------------------" << endl;
01170   ifstream iErrorEqn( fErrorEqn_cpp );
01171   if( !iErrorEqn.good() )
01172     {
01173       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01174       snprintf( mess, 
01175         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01176         "Failed to open %s file.", fErrorEqn_cpp );
01177       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_STD_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01178       throw e;
01179     }
01180   while( iErrorEqn.get(ch) )
01181     oOdePred_or_IdentPred_h.put(ch);
01182   iErrorEqn.close();
